title: codereview: diagnose submit at non-default branch
body:
after a goinstall of goprotobuf:

$ hg submit 5496065
Issue updated. URL: http://golang.org/cl/5496065
created new head
repository tip rolled back to revision 125 (undo commit)
working directory now based on revision 123
abort: local repository out of date; must sync before submit
$ hg sync
pulling from https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf
no changes found
$ hg submit 5496065
Issue updated. URL: http://golang.org/cl/5496065
created new head
repository tip rolled back to revision 125 (undo commit)
working directory now based on revision 123
abort: local repository out of date; must sync before submit
$ etcâ€¦.

"hg update default" was the missing magic
also hg change should have balked
